Title: PowerPoint to Silverlight Convertor
Description:
PPT 2007 to Silverlight  convertor tool converts the power point slides into Images and upload them in the XAML file to display via Silverlight 1.0

HomeWiki:
PPT to Silverlight Convertor Version 2.0 is out with rich feature set...

Highlights:
  • PPT Convertor with WPF interface
  • Presentation Gallery Control (fish-eye) to Show and Launch Converted PPT's
  • Custom Web Server for Hosting Converted PPT's (No Dependency on IIS)
  • Reusable PPT Viewer Component Showing Slides in familiar PowerPoint Look and Feel
  • Slide Navigation Controls (backward-forward)
  • Full Screen Mode in PPT Viewer
  • Built with Silverlight 2.0 RTM
  • Available with Installer

PPT Convertor


PPT Viewer


PPT Viewer (Full Screen)


............................................................................................................................................................................................................................................

Note from Release 1.0

PPT 2007 to Silverlight convertor tool converts the power point slides into Images and upload them in the XAML file to display via Silverlight 1.0

In the next phase once we will have the released version of Silverlight 2.0., will develop the next version which will have the mapping of each node in xml with the corresponding tag in XAML and would be able to cater the animation support provided by any presentation.
